data.message: You guys are a bunch of dicks lol. Yes, Ems a millionaire but just because he has that money doesn't mean he is obligated to hand it out. And yes, he is asking others to donate. He has a HUGE fan base and this message is being seen by SO many....the more that see it, the more help Flit may receive. Just because he is a celebrity doesn't mean he has to hand his money out. He worked damn hard for his and has bills and expenses too. It's like people forget that celebrities are human too and do have a life once they get off the stage...

replies.message: Couldn't agree more 👍👍👍👍👍

Thank you :) even if everyone who has commented on this thread or even if everyone who "liked" this page donated $1, that would be a huge impact on those in need. But it's like people enjoy bitching about things and they expect these celebrities to pay for everything just because of the amount of money they make. They're forgetting that celebs are humans too.
Well said
And he could do it himself along with his rich friends and write it off on taxes
Again, he is not obligated to do so. You and I could also donate and put it on our taxes...
Bills are chump change

Lol I love how small minded people think "rich" means "has unlimited money."  Dude donates more in a given year than most of us will even make, but when he asks for $10 from people to help out all of sudden he's an ass hole.  

Btw, writing an amount off your taxes only saves you money *IF* it lowers you into the next tax bracket; the more you make, the further it is between those thresholds.  Don't say someone can "write the money off their taxes" like that's an instant refund.
Absolutely James! The comments I've read have blown me away.
And take into consideration the guys gotta live too

I couldent agree more its not down to marshall to spend all his money for the fans hes done a fantastic job with the charities he supports im not from the USA but ive donated money to his charity from the UK to help support their amazing work

Darleen Arthur are you going to continuously comment that? He is under no obligation to donate or help people out, he does it because he can! And every other fucking person who donates can write it off on their taxes too. Not to mention he pays more taxes than you do and thus gives more to the community already! So get your head out of your ass and stop thinking the rich owe everyone something.
"BILLIONAIRE"...difference
Thomas Barnes still no difference, whether he has 1 million dollars or 1 billion dollars, he's still under no obligation.
